Where to have your baby
You can have your baby at 
home, in a midwife-led unit 
(MLU) or in hospital.
It is important that you make 
an informed decision about 
where you would like to give 
birth. It is up to you where you 
can have your baby. Even after 
you have decided, you can still 
change your mind.
Your midwife will discuss the 
options that are available to 
you locally, though you are 
free to choose any maternity 
se
